panels.description: The number of Nuxeo nodes in the cluster.
panels.title: Nuxeo nodes

panels.description: The number of errors in the Nuxeo's log for the running instances.
panels.title: Errors

panels.description: The number of warnings in the Nuxeo's log for the running instances.
panels.title: Warning

panels.description: The Nuxeo's log activity for the running instances.
panels.title: All

panels.description: The number of Stream processing computation terminated due to failure after applying the retry policy. A manual restart of Nuxeo is required to continue the processing, this must be done within the stream retention policy (7 days by default when using Kafka).
panels.title: Stream Failure

panels.description: Nuxeo node with failure needs to be restarted.
panels.title: Stream processor in failure

panels.description: This count the number of records skipped because the computation policy is configured to continue on failure. This requires some attention to understand why these records have been skipped.
panels.title: Records skipped due to failure

panels.description: The 5 most deviant lag per partition.
panels.title: Most deviant Lag

panels.description: The 5 slowest computations when processing record (mean).
panels.title: Slowest record processing

panels.description: The 5 computations that process the most record per minute.
panels.title: Top throughput records/min

panels.description: The 5 slowest computations when processing their timer (mean).
panels.title: Slowest timer processing
